product_name: Badger Anti-Bug Shake & Spray Insect Repellent
long_description: Certified-organic Badger Balm Anti-Bug Shake & Spray insect repellent keeps bugs away with the pleasant smell of rosemary, citronella and wintergreen essential oils. Effective for more than 3 hrs.; 100% natural and certified organic. Does not contain DEET. Spray bottle allows convenient application. Badger Balm Anti-Bug Shake & Spray insect repellent is safe for use on children; adult supervision is recommended when using this product on children.
short_description: Certified-organic Badger Balm Anti-Bug Shake & Spray insect repellent keeps bugs away with the pleasant smell of rosemary, citronella and wintergreen essential oils.
